abstract: Edul Ahmad, key witness at New York State Sen John L Sampson's obstruction trial, says Sampson threatened to silence people cooperating with investigators.
lead_paragraph: State Senator John L. Sampson threatened to silence people cooperating with investigators, a key witness testified at the senator’s obstruction trial.

headline.main: Ex-Friend of State Senator Tells of a Cover-Up
headline.print_headline: Sampson Ex-Friend Tells of a Cover-Up

snippet: State Senator John L. Sampson threatened to silence people cooperating with investigators, a key witness testified at the senator’s obstruction trial.
